Package it.polimi.ingsw.messages

Class MovementMessage

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.messages.Message
it.polimi.ingsw.messages.MovementMessage
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
ExchangeStudentMessage, MoveStudentMessage
public abstract class MovementMessage extends Message
The class MovementMessage is an abstract class that owns some methods used in the messages where there are movement or exchanges of the pawns
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • MovementMessage

      protected MovementMessage(String sender, Action action, Location departureType, int departureId, Location arrivalType, int arrivalId)
      The constructor of the class
      Parameters:
      sender - is the sender of the Message, is a String that contain the nickname of the player
      action - is the action that will be performed
      departureType - is the type of the departure location
      departureId - is the id of the departure location
      arrivalType - is the type of the arrival location
      arrivalId - is the id of the arrival location

  • Method Details

    • getLocation

      protected Movable getLocation(Game game, Location type, int id) throws NoPlayerException, NoIslandException
      This method return a location
      Parameters:
      game - is the object that represent the game and is used to modify the model
      type - is the type of the location to get
      id - is the id of the location to get
      Returns:
      a Movable that represent the location
      Throws:
      NoPlayerException - is the exception thrown if a player isn't found
      NoIslandException - is the exception thrown if an island with a specific id isn't found

    • checkErrorMovementLocations

      protected boolean checkErrorMovementLocations(Game game) throws NoActiveCardException
      This method check if the movement is allowed
      Parameters:
      game - is the object that represent the game and is used to modify the model
      Returns:
      a boolean that report if the movement is allowed
      Throws:
      NoActiveCardException - is the exception thrown if there is no character card active

    • getMovementCharacterCard

      protected MovementCharacter getMovementCharacterCard(Game game, Location typeCard)
      This method return a Character that permit movement
      Parameters:
      game - is the object that represent the game and is used to modify the model
      typeCard - is an enum representing the type of the Card
      Returns:
      a Movement Character (a Character that permit movement)
